src:
Januari, Pedro Hengkang dari Chelsea?
07 Nov 2019, 21:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Klub Premier League, Chelsea diberitakan akan kehilangan salah satu pemain senior mereka di bulan Januari nanti. Winger mereka, Pedro Rodriguez mulai mempertimbangkan hengkang dari London Barat.
Pedro merupakan salah satu pemain senior di Chelsea. Ia pertama kali bergabung dengan The Blues pada tahun 2015 silam dari Barcelona.
Empat tahun terakhir, Pedro berkontribusi cukup besar untuk skuat Chelsea. Ia membantu The Blues memenangkan satu gelar EPL dan satu gelar FA Cup.
Namun El Dorsal mengklaim bahwa Pedro ingin menyudahi kebersamaannya dengan Chelsea. Ia diberitakan akan pindah dari Stamford Bridge di bulan Januari nanti.

Mengapa Pedro ingin hengkang? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
January, Pedro Hengkang from Chelsea?
Nov 7 2019, 21:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Premier League club, Chelsea reported to be losing one of their senior players in January. Their winger, Pedro Rodriguez began to consider leaving from West London.
Pedro is one of the senior players at Chelsea. He first joined the Blues in 2015 from Barcelona.
The past four years, Pedro has contributed significantly to the Chelsea squad. He helped the Blues win an EPL title and an FA Cup title.
But El Dorsal claims that Pedro wants to end his time with Chelsea. He was reported to be moving from Stamford Bridge in January.

Why does Pedro want to leave? Check out the information below.
